data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I was required to code a simple, yet effective, Natural Language
    Processing module as I could not find one which is readily available
    on CPAN (or anywhere else).

    The module I have developed is very much in a development stage but
    I, and others, have found if very useful in "decoding" human text
    into "commands" that a module or script can understand.

    It is far from implementing advanced NLP, however, I believe that
    this is a good place to start.
